alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 3:52AM CDT until April 05 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... North central Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 351 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moro Bay State Park to near Farmerville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... West Crossett around 410 AM CDT. Crossett and North Crossett around 415 AM CDT. Old Milo around 420 AM CDT. Hamburg around 425 AM CDT. Bastrop around 430 AM CDT. Snyder around 435 AM CDT. Portland, Montrose and Parkdale around 445 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bonita, Collinston, Mer Rouge and Oak Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
